column5: well im looking for this lure from luhr jensen, its called hotlips. its a deep diving crankbait. does anyone here use them often or know where i could purchase them? i tryed bps,cabelas,lebaron,s.a.i.l and nobody has them!!!

I have used them on Erie for walleyes. There are 2 models a stretch model and a fatter style model. Both worked well but they pull hard and dive deep. Most of the dealers here in the SW carried them. I will look at a few shops.
hey bob im looking for the 1/2 oz model and 3/4 oz model stock number 6557 color 0949 thanks
